code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useFirebase}from'../context/Firebase';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(){const firebase=useFirebase();const[eemail,seteemail]=useState('');const[ppassword,setpassword]=useState('');const loginHandler=()=>{firebase.LogInWithEmailAndPassword(eemail,ppassword);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",onChange:e=>seteemail(e.target.value),placeholder:"Login Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",onChange:e=>setpassword(e.target.value),placeholder:"Login password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:loginHandler,children:"Login"})]});}export default Login;
